• Daily deals

Looking for an Adobe Acrobat alternative? LightPDF is a great, feature-rich PDF editor that costs less than half of an annual Adobe subscription. And it works on iPhones, Androids and Windows PCs.

LightPDF not only comes with countless PDF-editing features and OCR tech, but it’s also integrated with AI to summarize lengthy text for you. You can grab it for life for only $79.99 (regularly $109.99) while supplies last.

Save big with this Adobe Acrobat alternative

Here’s exactly what LightPDF’s tools let you accomplish:

  • OCR tool: Summarize a PDF’s main points, whether it’s a dense contract full of industry-specific jargon or academic articles, so you’re prepared for meetings and lectures.
  • AI features: It’s integrated with GPT to analyze and summarize multiple files, including PDF, Excel, PowerPoint, TXT, URLS, etc.
  • Edit: Add, modify or delete text, links, images and shapes in your PDFs. You can also extract certain images, adjust the background and insert headers and additional links and annotations.
  • Convert: Use LightPDF to convert PDFs to and from other file types like Word, TXT, JPG, etc. There are also batch-converting abilities that won’t ruin formatting or your PDF’s quality.
  • Annotate: Add text annotations, underlines, strikethroughs and additional comments to PDFs for better collaboration.

Adding this tool to your Mac (or Windows or Android device) not only makes working with PDFs more manageable, but changes and additions you make will also be accessible by anyone else who has access to it. This might be beneficial if you need to insert and manage digital signatures for legal docs, secure PDFs with passwords or transform your PDF into a fillable form.

LightPDF AI-Powered Premium Plan: Lifetime Subscription

Summarize and edit PDFs in minutes with lifetime access to LightPDF, now $79.99. That’s a 27% discount off the usual price of $109.99. To put it into perspective. Adobe Acrobat costs $14.99 a month, meaning just a year of access would set you back nearly $180.

Supplies are limited, so act while you can!
